alert.note: Alert for Bremer; Butler; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hardin, Black Hawk, Bremer, eastern Franklin, Grundy and Butler Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms around Iowa Falls, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ackley around 1105 PM CDT. Aplington around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Allison, Parkersburg, Clarksville, Shell Rock, Waverly, Denver and Tripoli. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 56 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Iowa. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Iowa.
